com.beaglebuddy.ape

Class APEItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beaglebuddy.ape.APEItem

  • public class APEItem
extends java.lang.Object

    This class provides methods for reading the APE Items in an APE tag. An Item consists of a key/value pair. While the key part of an item is always a String, the value may be a String or it may be raw binary data, such as an image file. The sample code shown in the APETag demonstrates how to read the values stored in items an APE tag. The APE specification(s) have defined a standardized list of keys, but users are not restricted to this list.

    See Also:
    APEv1 Specification, APEv2 Specification
